validations.errorHandling:
move sales-name  to  l5-name
     end-if
*>
     move     ih-invoic

if      ih-type  equal  2
              move  "Invoice"  to  l5-type
      else
              move  "Cr

write print-record from line-1 before 1
              write print-record from line-2 before 1
     end-if
     move     2 to line-cnt
